examples: It has been recommended by some recreational specialists that there should be one such playfield for each 500 children of high school age.

entries.meaning: The area within which a game (especially a video game) is played.
examples: The game has a tilt feature — tilt Fireball and a tilt sign glows and the scoring stops. The full-sized, full-color commercial playfield even has a special friction silk-screened surface so the ball will roll and not slide.
